The song is a tribute to the late singer, songwriter and actor, George Michael. Michael was the first person to be inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 1993. The song was written by Michael's brother, Michael Jackson, and was recorded by the Jackson 5. It was released on the album, Thriller, in 1997. Once upon a time  there was a boy named George  who was very rich. He lived in a large mansion. His parents were very wealthy. They had a lot of money. George was rich because he had inherited it from his parents. But he was also very poor. Because he lived on the streets. And he didn't have any money to buy food. So he ate what he could get. When he got hungry, he would eat some of the food he found. Sometimes he even ate some garbage. That was his diet. It was not very healthy. One day, George's parents died. The boy had to go to school. There was no money for school, so he went to the street. At the end of his walk he came to a big tree. On the tree he saw a beautiful girl. Once upon a time  a man was born with a special gift for music. He was gifted with the ability to play the piano. His parents were very proud of him. But his father was very strict and he was not allowed to practice his piano any more. The father wanted to teach his son how to read music and to be a musician. So he taught him to count. And he learned how many notes there are in a piano keyboard. Then he asked him if he wanted a toy piano to learn how he played. When the boy was a little boy, he had a very good piano and played it all the time. One day, his mother came home and found the child playing the same piano all day. She was so angry. Her son was playing a different piano every day and she wanted him back. To her surprise, the son told her that he liked the new piano better. Once upon a time  there was a man who was rich and powerful  and he was called king of the world. He lived in a palace with his servants and his horses. His servants were called servants of his kingdom. They were all very rich. One day the king went out to play golf. The golf course was very beautiful and the course had many trees. There were many beautiful golf balls. But the golf ball was the only one that could hit the green. All the other balls were too big. So the golfer was disappointed. Then he went back home. And he sat down in his room and wrote down his feelings. " I am a poor golf. I have no power to hit a golfball." He wrote his thoughts down. Later that day he got up and went to the garden. When he came back he saw that the trees were very green and beautiful. This was because the tree had not been cut down to make the road. Once upon a time  I was a kid  and I used to play with my toys. I liked to make them play. It was fun. Now I have grown up. I've become a grown-up. But I still like to be a child. When I play I like making things. And I love to watch my friends play as well. My toys are my best friends. They are like family. If I don't have my favorite toys, I feel sad. The toys that I enjoy playing with are the ones that bring me joy. Those are what I would like my kids to have. Children should have toys to enjoy. Kids should be allowed to do whatever they want to. It's not a matter of what they should do or not do. That's not what parents should decide for them. Parents should just be there to help them enjoy their toys and to give them a good time. This is what my parents did for me. So I hope my children will have the same. Thank you for sharing your story. You are a wonderful mother. Your children deserve to know that. Love you! ❤️❤❥❣️ Thank you so much for your kind

Once upon a time  the government of China was dominated by a small number of people who had special powers to impose their will on the nation. These were the so-called 'Shunzhi'. As the years went by, these people were losing their powers and becoming increasingly vulnerable. One day, the Shunzh... Read More e, who were in a state of panic, suddenly discovered that their power had been greatly reduced. Their power was now limited to one province. When they realized this, they began to panic and tried to escape. They managed to run into the mountains. After they ran into a cave, one of them was saved. The other one was crushed to death. This was the beginning of the Great Rebellion of Nanjing. In the 18th century, China had a total of thirteen provinces. China then divided into three provinces and twelve provinces in the early 20th century. It has been around a century since the last rebellion in China. And the China today is divided in three, six, and eleven provinces respectively. There are about 1,400 counties in total in Chinese. Once upon a time  I was a girl who liked a lot of things that I could see through a glass . I liked the colors and the patterns . When I first moved to New York City , I felt that there was too much to see . The buildings and people were too big for me . But I found my way around the city . All of the places that were open to me were easy to find . One of my favorite things about New york is the diversity . You can find places to eat that you do n't normally find in your home city , and there are places you can see the best of a city without leaving your apartment . There is a place for everything . It is amazing . New city life is very exciting and you have to keep up with the pace . Be prepared to be flexible and ready to try new things . Know that the world is full of exciting things to do . Once upon a time  before the war , a few weeks before Christmas, a couple of small shops  used to be run by a group of very talented musicians. Their repertoire included a wide variety of music. They were a bit of a musical paradise. This past week, the little shops have been shut down. The musicians have gone into hibernation. It is very sad to see them empty. My heart breaks for them. I would like to ask for a donation to help them through the shutdown. Thank you. Amanda F. Stout, Essex, United States of America . [Please provide your name] Amanda S. Once upon a time  there was a boy who was named Johnny, a black boy. Johnny was born to a woman named Margaret, and a man named Harry. Harry was more interested in singing than in growing crops, while Margaret was just as interested... in Johnny's development as a child. One day, Harry went to school, but when he got home, he found out that Margaret had gone out for a drink. He returned to his house and started calling Margaret and asking her why she was out drinking, because he wanted to talk to her. She didn't answer him. Then Harry began to make fun of Johnny. When Johnny saw this, his mother called his father and told him to go away. Margaret called Johnny and said, "You are not going to leave me Johnny! I am going out with Harry," and then the two of them went out. Soon the boy became very popular, especially among other boys. Everyone in the village was looking for Johnny to have a birthday party.
